languages.text: Торговец редкостями рассказал о необычном снаряжении для кибербестий, которое капитан корабля "Падение Ренегатов" отказался ему продавать. Он передал координаты места, в котором встретил упрямца последний раз.

The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.
languages.original_text: Торговец редкостями рассказал о необычном снаряжении для кибербестий, которое капитан корабля "Падение Ренегатов" отказался ему продавать. Он передал координаты места, в котором встретил упрямца последний раз.

traits.locale_text: The curiosity merchant told you about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He gave you the coordinates of the place where he last met the stubborn man.

The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

languages.text: Der Kuriositätenhändler erzählte {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von einem ungewöhnlichen Ausrüstungsteil für Cyber-Bestien, das der Captain der Renegades' Fall ihm nicht verkaufen wollte. Er stellte die Koordinaten des Ortes zur Verfügung, wo er den sturen Mann zum letzten Mal getroffen hatte.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: Der Kuriositätenhändler erzählte {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} von einem ungewöhnlichen Ausrüstungsteil für Cyber-Bestien, das der Captain der Renegades' Fall ihm nicht verkaufen wollte. Er stellte die Koordinaten des Ortes zur Verfügung, wo er den sturen Mann zum letzten Mal getroffen hatte.

languages.text: Selon le marchand de curiosités, le capitaine de la Chute des Renégats aurait refusé de lui vendre une pièce d'équipement de cyber-bête. Il a indiqué l'emplacement de l'homme entêté {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: Selon le marchand de curiosités, le capitaine de la Chute des Renégats aurait refusé de lui vendre une pièce d'équipement de cyber-bête. Il a indiqué l'emplacement de l'homme entêté {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.

languages.text: 那位奇珍商人提到了一件独一无二的生化使仆装备，说那是“叛党之殒号”舰长的珍宝，而那位舰长就是不肯让出这件宝物。奇珍商人告知了行商浪人最后一次与那位舰长见面时的坐标。
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: 那位奇珍商人提到了一件独一无二的生化使仆装备，说那是“叛党之殒号”舰长的珍宝，而那位舰长就是不肯让出这件宝物。奇珍商人告知了行商浪人最后一次与那位舰长见面时的坐标。
那位奇珍商人提到了一件独一无二的生化使仆装备，说那是“叛党之殒号”舰长的珍宝，而那位舰长就是不肯让出这件宝物。奇珍商人告知了你最后一次与那位舰长见面时的坐标。

languages.text: El mercader de curiosidades habló al Comerciante Independiente de un equipamiento inusual para ciberbestias que el capitán de la Caída de los Renegados se había negado a venderle. Le proporcionó las coordenadas del lugar donde vio por última vez al tozudo oficial.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: El mercader de curiosidades habló al Comerciante Independiente de un equipamiento inusual para ciberbestias que el capitán de la Caída de los Renegados se había negado a venderle. Le proporcionó las coordenadas del lugar donde vio por última vez al tozudo oficial.

languages.text: 珍品商人はレネゲイズ・フォールの船長が頑なに売らなかった珍しいサイバービースト装備について語った。彼はその頑固な男と最後に会った場所の座標を提供した。
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: 珍品商人はレネゲイズ・フォールの船長が頑なに売らなかった珍しいサイバービースト装備について語った。彼はその頑固な男と最後に会った場所の座標を提供した。

languages.text: Antikacı; Hainlerin Bozgunu'nun kaptanının kendisine bir türlü satmadığı, tuhaf bir siber hayvan parçasından Hür Tacir'e bahsetti. O inatçı adamla son karşılaştığı yerin koordinatlarını da vermeyi ihmal etmedi.
languages.original_text: The curiosity merchant told the Rogue Trader about an unusual piece of cyber-beast equipment that the captain of the Renegades' Fall had refused to sell him. He provided the coordinates of the place where he had last met the stubborn man.

traits.locale_text: Antikacı; Hainlerin Bozgunu'nun kaptanının kendisine bir türlü satmadığı, tuhaf bir siber canavar parçasından Hür Tacir'e bahsetti. O inatçı adamla son karşılaştığı yerin koordinatlarını da vermeyi ihmal etmedi.
